steps.title: What is Celo Gold?
steps.text: Celo Gold helps keep the Celo Dollar stable and the Celo Network running.

steps.title: Celo Goldâ€™s price changes
steps.text: Unlike Celo Dollars, the value of Celo Gold changes. If more people use Celo Dollar, the value of Celo Gold increases.

steps.title: Please buy and sell responsibly
steps.text: *Celo* allows you to buy and sell Celo Gold. Gold presents a risk of financial loss so please do so responsibly.
